thread.title: Sidney family sues Texas company over son's 2013 Bakken death

title: Sidney family sues Texas company over son's 2013 Bakken death
text:
Published By: Billings Gazette: Montana - Today 
Family members of a Sidney man found dead at a Bakken oil collection tank in 2013 are suing a Texas-based oil company.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
